name: Koi Puncher MMXVIII
description:
YOU ARE A KOI PUNCHER.

YOU PUNCH KOI.

IT IS TIME TO PUNCH KOI, KOI PUNCHER

KOI PUNCHER MMXVIII is the greatest koi-punching experience ever realized in a video game. 

  • Thousands of koi
  • Four-player simultaneous multiplayer
  • Challenge game modes
  • Unlimited punching
  • Eight playable characters
  • Hidden secrets

日本語でも遊べる！
